rukus.text: Kitabam vale (yahudi ate isa'i) ate musarikina (sarika manana vale) vicom' jinham lokam ne inakara kita, uha manana vale nahim. Jadom taka unham de kola sapasata pramana na a jave
Alaha valom ika rasula jihara pavitara sahiphe (gatha) parhake sunave
Jinham vica thika vise likhe hona
Ate jihare loka kitaba vale sana, uha sapasata pramana a jana de ba'ada hi vakha-vakha ho ga'e
Halanki unham nu iha hi hukama dita gi'a si, ki uha alaha di ibadata karana. Usa la'i dina nu ikagara ho ke sudha kara dena ate namaza sathapita karana ate zakata ada karana. Iha hi saca dina hai
Besaka kitaba vale ate musarikinam (sarika manana vale) vicom' jinham lokam ne avagi'a kiti, uha naraka di aga vica painage. Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Iha loka hi sabha tom baî€¼ure jiva hana
Uha hi loka jihare imana li'a'e ate unham ne cage kama kite. Iha loka hi sabha tom cage (utama) jiva hana

Unham da badala unham de raba kola hamesa rahina vala baga hai, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am, uha unham vica hamesa rahinage. Alaha unham tom khusa ate uha alaha tom khusa. Iha usa bade la'i hai, jihara apane raba tom dare
